ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription:
They quickly quickly grow into delicate, almost translucent frills where [npc.herHim] ears would normally be.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldOctopus(large, octopus-like ears)], which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair of octopus-like ears, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)]#IF(npc.isPiercedEar()), and which have been pierced#ENDIF.
